title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view
description:
Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view.

Actual Behavior (OB): Any item can't be selected at the first time in the library outline view. The focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view.

Expected Behavior (EB): The selected item should be highlighted and the focus should remain on the selected item.

Steps to Reproduce (SR):
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view.
3. Observe that the item is not selected and the focus jumps to the library file node.
4. Select the same item again and observe that it can now be selected correctly.
